title: 7/6/21: Exxon Corruption, Surfside Tragedy, Amazon's Inhumanity, Britney Spears, Sock Eating, Kamala Harris, Freedom, and more!

itunes:subtitle: Krystal and Saagar talk about the corruption of Exxon, Surfside's building collapse, Amazon's inhumane working conditions, Britney Spears's conservatorship, Kamala's latest failures, freedom in America, mass evictions, and Saagar eats a sock!
